title: Learning to live
creator_credit: Phillip Sattin, Guy Fergusson, London Foundation for Marriage Education and Eothen Films
brief_description: A sex education film for adolescents emphasising preparation for marriage. Animated diagrams are used to explain the reproductive system and the proces of conception.
